llm_analysis.narrative_start_marker: In my younger and more vulnerable years my father gave me some advice that I've been turning over in my mind ever since.
llm_analysis.narrative_end_marker: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
anomalies: Table of Contents appears at beginning
